resources.string: Please enter the UserId of the audience

Co-anchoring: 
1. Anchor A
1.1 Anchor A starts publishing streams.
1.2 Anchor A’s audience play anchor A’s streams.
1.3 The co-anchoring user B plays anchor A’s streams.

2. Co-anchoring user B
2.1 The co-anchoring user B input userId and streamId.
2.2 The co-anchoring user B stops playing webrtc streams.
2.3 The co-anchoring user B playing rtc streams.
2.4 The co-anchoring user B starts publishing streams.

3. Co-anchoring
3.1 User B’s streams are mixed into anchor A’s.
